quotes.quote: Wedding memories will eventually fade, but true love lasts forever.
Congratulations to you both on your special day! Enjoy your wedding and the rest of your lives together.
Pop, fizz, clink! Here's to your wedding day and all the days that follow.
On your wedding, I wish you all the best as you embark on this precious journey together.
Happy Wedding day! Eat cake, pop champagne, and dance the night away.
When your wedding day ends, the real fun begins. Cheers to a beautiful marriage, my friends!
The greatest joy of a wedding is the marriage that will follow.
Eternal romance. Unwavering love. May your wedding day bring you all you wish for, and so much more.
From sunrise to sunset, and every beautiful moment in between, let true love reign.
May the Universe shower the two of you with blessings on your wedding day.
Wedding Day: one day down, and forever to go.
A beautiful chapter begins on your wedding day. Wishing you both a lifetime of love.
Happy wedding day! Wishing you immense joy, happiness, and laughter throughout your marriage.
Your wedding day will come and go, but the love between you will continue to grow. Congratulations on your wedding!
My very best wishes for a beautiful wedding day, and may the days that follow be filled with neverending joy.
May the light of love that surrounds you on your wedding day illuminate your path forward for many happy years to come.
Your wedding day is more than just a ceremony. It's a chance for the two of you to share your unbridled happiness with your friends and family.
"I do" is just the beginning of your amazing adventure. Congratulations on your wedding!
Love is always something to celebrate. Happy Wedding Day!
Sending the most heartfelt wishes for love and happiness, on your wedding day and always.
Monumental commitment. Unconditional love. Enduring friendship. Happy Wedding Day!
Wishing you the joy and peace of eternal love, on your wedding day and always.
May you always glow with love the way you do on your wedding day.
Wishing you a wedding day filled with love, magic, and dreams coming true.
Some of the greatest love stories ever told begin with "I do." Congratulations on your wedding!
